job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Role</strong>: Data Scientist</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Roles and Responsibilities</strong></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span></strong></p><p><strong>Suitable candidates will be part of Wipro Digital-Intelligent Enterprise practice. The role entails leveraging Data Science and Machine Learning to solve typical problems within an organization and create IP that could be deployed in a productized&nbsp;mode. This will entail significant hands-on work on multiple Big Data Technologies, Data Analysis, Identifying data patterns, ML models, Insights generation. The role entails deployment in a customer context and managing customer expectations. </strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Technical Skills Required:</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hands on with Python or R</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Analytics using industry leading BI tools and technologies</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Implementation knowledge of supervised\un-supervised machine learning algorithms</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good statistical analysis skills for data pre-processing and data wrangling</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experienced in using big data frameworks like Hadoop</strong></p><p><strong>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Knowledge of business intelligence tools or reporting tools </strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Data Preparation for Modeling</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Missing Data Imputation,Outlier Treatment</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Scaling, Normalization, Standardization</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Encoding for Categorical Variables</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Oversampling\Undersampling for reducing class imbalance</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Experience in building solutions using Model Library</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Feature Selection</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Tree-based Ensemble Models</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gradient\Adaptive Boosted Trees</strong></p><p><strong>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hyper-parameter tuning </strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Building Prediction mechanisms using methods like Logistic regression, voting classifier stacking etc</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>
